Putting filthy things in your mouth, monthly.

J*sus Chr*st

Happy Easter. Here’s a list of all the ways I know to say “Jesus Christ” without saying “Jesus” or “Christ”:

  • Gee whillikers
  • Gee whiz
  • Jeepers creepers
  • Jiminy Christmas
  • Jiminy Cricket
  • Jeeze Louise
  • Judas Priest
  • Jumping Jehosephat
  • Jeezy Creezy
  • Jersey Mike’s
  • Cheese and rice
  • Cheese and crepes
  • Jibjab Crumbo
  • Bajeezus
  • Bejabbers
  • Holy Chris
  • For crying out loud
  • Cripes
  • Crikey
  • Fuck

Enjoy spring.
